title: BitcoinSoloMiner
author: BitcoinSoloMiner
content: 2 for $3530 plus 20% import charge.A good deal? Brand new from bitmainDiscuss!

comments.author: DejavuUS
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinSoloMiner on August 13, 2022, 08:32:18 AM2 for  plus 20% import charge.A good deal? Brand new from bitmainDiscuss!link?

comments.author: Aio Ikari
comments.body: Quote from: DejavuUS on August 14, 2022, 07:22:49 PMQuote from: BitcoinSoloMiner on August 13, 2022, 08:32:18 AM2 for  plus 20% import charge.A good deal? Brand new from bitmainDiscuss!link?already out of stock, not lasted even 1 week

comments.author: hZti
comments.body: Well then it seems like it was a good deal. It is in general at the moment very good to buy miners, at least if you believe that bitcoin can recover longterm. If you are lucky and pay the miners in BTC than you can even buy back the BTC with fiat in a few days/weeks for a discount.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: hZti on August 27, 2022, 09:11:39 PMWell then it seems like it was a good deal. It is in general at the moment very good to buy miners, at least if you believe that bitcoin can recover longterm. If you are lucky and pay the miners in BTC than you can even buy back the BTC with fiat in a few days/weeks for a discount.Actually, no one knows if the price of Bitcoin will stay stable at $20k or if it will recover in the long term but there is a strong support at $20k so there is a big possibility after a few months it will increase. About the discount deal maybe November is a good time to buy(BlackFriday and CyberMonday)?Canaan also has many discounts their units are very cheap nowadays look here https://shop.canaan.io/products/ It would be also a good deal.
